snippet: The gain in consumer borrowing was the seventh straight monthly increase and the largest since November 2001.
abstract: Federal Reserve says consumer debt rose by $21.4 billion in March from February; it was the seventh straight monthly increase and the largest since November 2001.
lead_paragraph: The gain in consumer borrowing was the seventh straight monthly increase and the largest since November 2001.

headline.seo: Consumers Raised Debt by $21.4 Billion In March
